00019    */
00020    template <class Archive>
00021    void MTRand_int32::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00022    {
00023       for (int i=0; i < n; ++i) {
00024          ar & state[i];
00025       }
00026       ar & p;
00027       ar & init;
00028    }
00029 
00030    /*
00031    * Serialize to/from an archive.
00032    */
00033    template <class Archive>
00034    void Random::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00035    {
00036       ar & engine_;
00037       ar & seed_;
00038    }
